title: Goblin Boss
contents: property | Senses | darkvision 60 ft., passive Perception 9
description | Nimble Escape | The goblin can take the Disengage or Hide action as a bonus action on each of its turns.
description | Multiattack | The goblin makes two attacks with its scimitar. The second attack has disadvantage.
description | Scimitar | Melee Weapon Attack: +4 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. Hit: 5 (1d6 + 2) slashing damage.
description | Javelin | Melee or Ranged Weapon Attack: +4 to hit, reach 5 ft. or range 30/120 ft., one target. Hit: 5 (1d6 + 2) piercing damage.

description | Redirect Attack | When a creature the goblin can see targets it with an attack, the goblin chooses another goblin within 5 feet of it. The two goblins swap places, and the chosen goblin becomes the target instead.
